description: Educational attainment, enrollment, institutions, and outcomes

concepts.label: Educational Attainment
concepts.definition: Highest level of education completed by individuals

concepts.label: High School Graduation Rate
concepts.definition: Percentage of population with high school diploma or equivalent

concepts.label: Bachelor's Degree Attainment Rate
concepts.definition: Percentage of population with bachelor's degree or higher

concepts.label: School Enrollment
concepts.definition: Number of people enrolled in educational institutions

concepts.label: Preschool Enrollment
concepts.definition: Children ages 3-4 enrolled in preschool programs

concepts.label: Elementary School Enrollment
concepts.definition: Children enrolled in elementary school (grades K-5)

concepts.label: Middle School Enrollment
concepts.definition: Students enrolled in middle school (grades 6-8)

concepts.label: High School Enrollment
concepts.definition: Students enrolled in high school (grades 9-12)

concepts.label: College Enrollment
concepts.definition: Students enrolled in college or graduate school

concepts.label: Graduate School Enrollment
concepts.definition: Students enrolled in graduate or professional school

concepts.label: Public School Enrollment
concepts.definition: Students enrolled in public educational institutions

concepts.label: Private School Enrollment
concepts.definition: Students enrolled in private educational institutions

concepts.label: Less Than High School Education
concepts.definition: Population without high school diploma or equivalent

concepts.label: Some College Education
concepts.definition: Population with some college but no degree

concepts.label: Associate Degree Attainment
concepts.definition: Population with associate degree

concepts.label: Master's Degree Attainment
concepts.definition: Population with master's degree

concepts.label: Professional Degree Attainment
concepts.definition: Population with professional degree (JD, MD, etc.)

concepts.label: Doctorate Degree Attainment
concepts.definition: Population with doctorate degree

concepts.label: Field of Bachelor's Degree
concepts.universe: Population 25 years and over with bachelor's degree
concepts.definition: Distribution of bachelor's degrees by field of study

concepts.label: STEM Degree Attainment
concepts.universe: Population 25 years and over with bachelor's degree
concepts.definition: Population with degrees in Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics

concepts.label: Educational Attainment by Age
concepts.definition: Educational attainment cross-tabulated by age groups

concepts.label: Educational Attainment by Gender
concepts.definition: Educational attainment cross-tabulated by sex

concepts.label: Educational Attainment by Race
concepts.definition: Educational attainment by race and Hispanic origin

concepts.label: Veteran Educational Attainment
concepts.definition: Educational attainment among veterans

concepts.label: Language of Instruction
concepts.definition: Primary language of instruction in educational settings

concepts.label: Educational Expenses
concepts.definition: Annual educational expenses per household

concepts.label: Student Loan Debt
concepts.definition: Outstanding student loan debt per household

concepts.label: Computer Access for Education
concepts.definition: Access to computers for educational purposes

concepts.label: Internet Access for Education
concepts.definition: Access to internet for educational purposes

concepts.label: Educational Attainment with Disability
concepts.universe: Population 25 years and over with disability
concepts.definition: Educational attainment among population with disabilities

concepts.label: Teacher Population
concepts.universe: Civilian employed population 16 years and over
concepts.definition: Number of people employed as teachers

concepts.label: Education Administrators
concepts.universe: Civilian employed population 16 years and over
concepts.definition: Number of people employed in education administration

concepts.label: Childcare Workers
concepts.universe: Civilian employed population 16 years and over
concepts.definition: Number of people employed in childcare services

concepts.label: Education Support Staff
concepts.universe: Civilian employed population 16 years and over
concepts.definition: Number of people employed in education support roles

concepts.label: Library Workers
concepts.universe: Civilian employed population 16 years and over
concepts.definition: Number of people employed in library services

concepts.label: Income by Educational Attainment
concepts.universe: Population 25 years and over with earnings
concepts.definition: Median earnings by educational attainment level

concepts.label: Poverty by Educational Attainment
concepts.universe: Population 25 years and over for whom poverty status determined
concepts.definition: Poverty rate by educational attainment level

concepts.label: Employment by Educational Attainment
concepts.universe: Civilian labor force 25 years and over
concepts.definition: Employment rate by educational attainment level

concepts.label: Adult Education Program Participation
concepts.definition: Adults enrolled in continuing education programs

concepts.label: Vocational Training Participation
concepts.definition: Participation in vocational or technical training programs

concepts.label: Educational Mobility
concepts.definition: Geographic mobility by educational attainment

concepts.label: Commuting by Educational Attainment
concepts.definition: Mean travel time to work by educational attainment

concepts.label: Home Schooling
concepts.definition: Children educated at home rather than in schools

concepts.label: Special Education Services
concepts.definition: Students receiving special education services

concepts.label: Bilingual Education Programs
concepts.definition: Students in bilingual or ESL education programs

concepts.label: Educational Technology Access
concepts.definition: Access to educational technology and digital resources

concepts.label: After School Program Participation
concepts.definition: Children participating in after-school programs

concepts.label: Parental Educational Attainment
concepts.definition: Educational attainment of parents with children under 18

concepts.label: Educational Funding per Student
concepts.definition: Average per-pupil educational expenditure

concepts.label: School Dropout Rate
concepts.definition: Percentage of students who dropped out of school

concepts.label: School Graduation Rate
concepts.definition: Percentage completing high school or equivalent
